summary: Eves hybrid form eyes from Underworld Awakening.
descriptionHtml:
Just my take on her eyes from the movie.
Made them for myself and decided to share.

The esp need the most recent update 1.9.32

I only made them for females cause in the movie the only Tri-Blood Hybrid that has them is female.

There are the regular ones that I use and some brighter ones for peeps that like super glowy eyes.

These are completely stand alone, load order shouldn't matter but I'd put them below
what ever race menu you may be using just in case.

Used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4244118]dumle35[/url]'s eye glowmaps and eye meshes as a base, with public permissions. So credits to him.
dumle35 - "Enyone feel free to use my mod and and add/edit it and upload to nexus, just credit me and leave a link to my original mod, PEACE! :D"
Original Mod - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/?][size=2]Skyrim - Glowing Eyes v4[/size][/url]

And same goes for this use this for whatever you want just give me proper credit.

Hope you guys enjoy them and upload pics of your toons with them if you like, I'd like seeing getting used. :)
(no pics with nude characters please I don't wanna have to mark the file as adult only thanks)
author: Artson
